name: Jezebel Kinja Fixes
description: Fixes a few annoying things about the new layout. Choose yes or no for each. 1.Thumbnail Scrolling: Makes all the images small when scrolling the 'latest' and 'recommended' pages 2.Normal Image Size: Makes story image normal size instead of huge (haven't got this working for vids yet) 3.Hide Annotations: Hides the black pointy things on images 4.Un-grey Comments: Gives unapproved comments the same background & text as approved comments 5.Retro Logo: Change logo to retro style with no Jezebel lady To apply this to all the Gawker sites go here Related:Gawker Kinja Fixes, Retro Jezebel
